spec_data.Name: perl-Devel-CheckOS
spec_data.Description:
Devel::CheckOS provides a more friendly interface to $^O, and also lets you
check for various OS families such as Unix, which includes things like Linux,
*BSD, AIX, HPUX, Solaris etc.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 10:51:45 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Check what OS we're running on
